input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)

Item keywords:
100% Rubber
Imported
Rubber sole
Shaft measures approximately 7" from arch
Heel measures approximately 0.5"
Boot opening measures approximately 11" around
Waterproof
Flexible sole
Recyclable
Reflective patches

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Kamik Squirt Rain Boot combines a variety of innovative features that make it an ideal choice for outdoor activities in wet weather. Made from 100% rubber, this boot is completely waterproof and can withstand long exposure to rain without leaking. The flexible sole is designed to be comfortable and supportive, ensuring that you can walk for extended periods of time without feeling tired or uncomfortable. The reflective patches on the boot provide increased visibility in low-light conditions, making it easier to navigate dark areas. The Kamik Squirt Rain Boot is also recyclable, so you can feel good about your environmentally-friendly purchase.
input_text.Response B: This adorable rain boot features a soft, flexible upper with reflective patches for added safety, a non-slip, waterproof rubber outsole, and an easy-on side gore.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
